name: dragos-worldview-threat-intelligence
label: Dragos WorldView Threat Intelligence
description: Dragos WorldView industrial threat intelligence provides actionable information and recommendations on threats to operations technology (OT) environments. This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: FQDN of the Dragos server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Access Token
fields.name: api_token
fields.description: API Access Token of the Dragos server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Secret Key
fields.name: api_secret
fields.description: API Secret Key of the Dragos server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get All Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all indicators from Dragos based on indicator value, type (IP, Domain, or Hostname), and other filter criteria that you have specified.

parameters.title: Indicator Value
parameters.name: value
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify an indicator value to get details from Dragos.
parameters.tooltip: Specify indicator value to get details from Dragos

parameters.title: Indicator Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the type of indicator whose details you want to retrieve from Dragos. Choose from the following indicator types: Domain, Filename, Hostname, IP, MD5, SHA1, SHA256.
parameters.tooltip: Choose the type of indicator

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the count of records that the operation should include per page. Page size must be less than 1001. The default value is 500.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the count of records that the operation should include per page. Page size must be less than 1001. The default value is 500.
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Default value: 1
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the page number from which to retrieve the records. The default value is 1

parameters.title: Updated After
parameters.tooltip: Datetime from which you wish to retrieve indicators
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the date and time after which to retrieve indicators. The DateTime must be in the ISO format (UTC).
parameters.name: updated_after

parameters.title: Report Serial Numbers
parameters.tooltip: List of report serial numbers
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the list of serial numbers of the report containing the indicators to retrieve.
parameters.name: serial

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tags
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list of tags for the indicators to search and retrieve.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the list of tags for the indicators to search and retrieve.
